substeps.plaintext: Interact with the door to her domain to talk to her.
substeps.markdown: Interact with the door to her domain to talk to her.

steps.plaintext: Go to the Adeptus' abode and search for the "Dwelling in the Clouds" Blueprints
steps.markdown: Go to the Adeptus' abode and search for the ◀"Dwelling in the Clouds" Blueprints▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/%22Dwelling_in_the_Clouds%22_Blueprints▷

substeps.plaintext: The blueprints are located on the floating island on Qingyun Peak, unlocked by completing the Three Cranes Puzzle.
substeps.markdown: The blueprints are located on the floating island on ◀Qingyun Peak▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Qingyun_Peak▷, unlocked by completing the ◀Three Cranes Puzzle▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Three_Cranes_Puzzle▷.

steps.plaintext: Give the blueprints to Cloud Retainer
steps.markdown: Give the blueprints to Cloud Retainer

substeps.plaintext: Complete a time trial challenge. Reach the target location within 150 seconds (02:30 min). Slimes will spawn and grant +15 extra seconds per kill.
substeps.markdown: Complete a time trial challenge. Reach the target location within 150 seconds (02:30 min). Slimes will spawn and grant +15 extra seconds per kill.

substeps.plaintext: Rotate CW/CCW → 3 Hydro → 3 Pyro → Rotate CW → Activate wind current → Return, 3 Electro → Return to middle platform, rotate CCW → 3 Anemo → Rotate CCW → 1 Electro, 1 Hydro, 1 Pyro → Rotate CW/CCW
substeps.markdown: Rotate CW/CCW → 3 Hydro → 3 Pyro → Rotate CW → Activate wind current → Return, 3 Electro → Return to middle platform, rotate CCW → 3 Anemo → Rotate CCW → 1 Electro, 1 Hydro, 1 Pyro → Rotate CW/CCW

substeps.plaintext: The puzzle can be skipped by using character abilities that allows the player to glide to the middle of the platform.
substeps.markdown: The puzzle can be skipped by using character abilities that allows the player to ◀glide▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Gliding▷ to the middle of the platform.

steps.plaintext: Place the blueprints before Cloud Retainer
steps.markdown: Place the blueprints before Cloud Retainer
